Home > Hotels & Resorts > 5 Best Spa Resorts In The US To Relax 5 Best Spa Resorts In The US To Relax By admin on October 7, 2015 Pin It 
Spa nowadays have turnout to be the best spot of relaxation and enjoyment during your weekends or even a prefect venture for short trips. Moreover, destination spas have more benefit rather than relaxing. 
There are many best spa resorts in the US, which help in stress management, life coaching and overall development in art of living. They help you pamper yourself and at the same time, you reenergize form the stressful life. Best Spa Resorts In The US 
Some of the best spa resorts in the US to enjoy relaxation are as follow: Rancho Valencia Spa 
Rancho Valencia Spa is located in Rancho Santa Fe, in California. It is not only one of the best spa resorts in the US, but also one of the best hotels in California. This is Mediterranean inspired resort, which is spread over 45 acres of land filled with lush gardens and olive groves making it a perfect place to enjoy relaxation and wellness. 
Your spa session starts by sipping a glass of freshly made organic fruit and vegetable juice, and then it is followed with signature Six Sense massage. 
For more information: Rancho Valencia Spa Lake Austin Spa Resort 
Lake Austin Spa resort is located along the Colorado River in beautiful Texas Hill Country, which is just outside the Austin City in Texas. Spread over 25000 square foot facility is one of the luxurious and best spa resorts for overnight spa or day spa and to enjoy relaxation. 
You can choose from nearly 100 unique treatments, also enjoy hot tubs, stream rooms, pool, etc in this resort. 
For more information: Lake Austin Spa Resort Four Seasons Resort Palm Beach 
Four Seasons Resort Palm Beach is located on the beautiful Palm Beach, Florida. This heavenly luxurious resort spread over 6acres with beautiful oceanfront is perfect place for tropical escape. 
Spa in this resort allows you to enjoy local, organic, and customized spa treatment, which lets you relax, attunes your mood with ocean rhythms. You can also enjoy sauna, steam room, whirlpool, and relaxation. 
For further details: Four Seasons Resort Palm Beach Canyon Ranch Lenox 
Personalize service at every step makes your stay a true living and with the help of various health care plans you can replenish yourself in the most natural way. It has the advantages of indoor strain removal as well as outdoor activities to regain your physicality to the fullest extent. 
To know more about : Canyon Ranch Lenox Aspira Spa 
The Aspira is located at the Osthoff Ave around the sacred water of the Wisxinsinâ€™s Elkhart Lake. It is best known for its profound healing techniques developed across the world ranging from organic, local products and feng shui inspired design to give you a holistic experience. 
The spa has been built from a global perspective giving you access to hoi oil message from Moroccan to traditional lomi lomi from Hawaiian. You can even enjoy the local of body masque with chamomile or with the lavender for the resorts own garden. 
Besides the spa the hotel has the facilities like bike rentals, sail boats on rental basis for you to enjoy the natural beauty as well.
